TextBlock.Text: <color=lightblue>Enji</color>: I've finally cleaned up the crash site. Of all the places in the universe to wind up, this is an idyllic spot.
With that said, I'm surprised that Nomai tech was already here before I showed up. Well, maybe not. Our clans are everywhere.
I was worried that someone might show up and start asking questions, but it would seem that no one's around this particular star.
Upon further inspection, there seems to be a <color=orange>derelict vessel</color> in the distance... Did something happen to this particular clan?
Surely we would have heard about something like that. It's not every day a clan chooses to abandon a <color=orange>vessel</color>.
...Well, perhaps I might relate to that last bit.
Anyways, I've covered my tracks to the best of my ability. For now I'll rest and in the morning my project begins.
